column2:
This decision shows all optional decisions to tweak and change the default Converted mod behaviour. The list includes:
 - Disable British Dominions (HPM hybrid)

This, along with all decisions it enables, will disappear January 1st 1837 to reduce clutter, so you have a year in-game to pick and choose what you want. Once a tweak is chosen, you can't disable it anymore, so if you misclick you need to edit your save or start a new game.
This will hide all optional tweaks to default Converted mod. You still have until 1837 to change your mind though.

Prevents The United Kingdom/England from releasing their dominions (Columbia, Newfoundland, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, Alaska, Southern Rhodesia, Canada, Quebec and Maritime Republic) via HPM decisions and events.
